backend/main.mo: Defines an empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Lists two feature evidence reports detailing print functionality requirements and associated frontend files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for many frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles, color tokens, and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React application and references the Maui Lane favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, query client, auth gate, and renders the main app shell with toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedGa: Authentication wrapper that shows a login screen or renders children based on Internet Identity state.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiAppShel: Provides the main app layout with header, navigation, content outlet, and footer with printâ€‘hiding UI chrome.
frontend/src/components/maui/MauiNav.tsx: Renders the navigation bar with links for Dashboard and Reference Capture and highlights the active route.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/A: Modal form for adding a new resident with extensive personal, medical, and contact information fields.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/E: Dialog component for editing resident details with validation and dynamic physician fields.
frontend/src/components/maui/residents/R: Displays a resident summary card with status, metrics, and actions like view, discharge, and delete.
Header section for the resident dashboard with title and add-resident button.
Filter and sort bar allowing users to filter residents by room and sort by various fields.
Renders a grid of ResidentCard components or a placeholder when no residents match filters.
Shows KPI cards for total, active, and discharged residents.
Tabs for filtering residents by status: All, Active, or Discharged.
frontend/src/components/references/Missi: UI placeholder showing missing reference categories and items with a link to the reference checklist.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, login/clear actions, and manages identity loading and state through an auth client.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future backend-related React Query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables for light/dark modes, and extensive print-specific styling.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function combining clsx and tailwind-merge for merging class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global CSS.
frontend/src/pages/maui/Dashboard.tsx: Implements resident dashboard with filters, sorting, KPIs, and add-resident dialog using mock data.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/mockRe: Provides mock medication data and a helper to fetch medications per resident ID.
Builds structured mock profile data for a resident based on mockResidents, including physicians and insurance.
Supplies mock resident list with IDs, demographics, room info, and counts for physicians and medications.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/reside: Contains utilities to filter, sort, compute KPIs, and extract unique rooms from resident lists.
frontend/src/pages/maui/residents/Reside: Displays detailed resident profile with tabs, editing, printing, and medication actions using mock data.
Renders a print-only resident profile report with personal, insurance, and medication information.
frontend/src/pages/references/MoritzRefe: React page listing required UI reference screenshots and design details for recreating the Moritz Care Home interface.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot describing the project's state, goals, and implemented features across backend, frontend, and tooling.
